00017 #include "MisrReProject.h"
00018 #include "MisrError.h"
00019 #include "MisrUtil.h"
00020 
00036 MTKt_status MtkTransformCoordinates(
00037   MTKt_MapInfo mapinfo,       
00038   MTKt_DataBuffer latbuf,     
00039   MTKt_DataBuffer lonbuf,     
00040   MTKt_DataBuffer *linebuf,   
00041   MTKt_DataBuffer *samplebuf   )
00042 {
00043   MTKt_status status;           /* Return status */
00044   MTKt_status status_code;      /* Return code of this function */
00045   MTKt_DataBuffer line = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT;
00046                                 /* Line data buffer structure */
00047   MTKt_DataBuffer sample = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT;
00048                                 /* Sample data buffer structure */
00049 
00050   /* Check latitude and longitude buffer sizes */
00051   if (latbuf.nline != lonbuf.nline)
00052     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(MTK_DIMENSION_MISMATCH);
00053   if (latbuf.nsample != lonbuf.nsample)
00054     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(MTK_DIMENSION_MISMATCH);
00055 
00056   /* Check latitude and longitude buffer datatypes */
00057   if (latbuf.datatype != MTKe_double)
00058     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(MTK_DATATYPE_MISMATCH);
00059   if (lonbuf.datatype != MTKe_double)
00060     MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(MTK_DATATYPE_MISMATCH);
00061 
00062    /* --------------------------------------------------- */
00063   /* Allocate buffers of the latitude and longitude data */
00064   /* --------------------------------------------------- */
00065 
00066   status = MtkDataBufferAllocate(latbuf.nline, latbuf.nsample,
00067                  MTKe_float, &line);
00068   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00069   status = MtkDataBufferAllocate(latbuf.nline, latbuf.nsample,
00070                  MTKe_float, &sample);
00071   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00072 
00073   /* ------------------------------------------------- */
00074   /* Transform lat/lon to line/sample for give mapinfo */
00075   /* ------------------------------------------------- */
00076 
00077   status = MtkLatLonToLSAry(mapinfo, latbuf.nline * latbuf.nsample,
00078                 latbuf.dataptr, lonbuf.dataptr,
00079                 line.dataptr, sample.dataptr);
00080   if (status == MTK_NULLPTR || status == MTK_BAD_ARGUMENT)
00081     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(status);
00082 
00083   *linebuf = line;
00084   *samplebuf = sample;
00085 
00086   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00087 ERROR_HANDLE:
00088   MtkDataBufferFree(&line);
00089   MtkDataBufferFree(&sample );
00090   return status_code;
00091 }
